title: How to Care for Several Teddy Bears

steps.headline: Choose their personality.
steps.description: They could all have the same personality or they could have different ones. Choose their gender too.

steps.headline: Make or buy them all clothes, if you want.
steps.description: Buy them all the same amount of clothes, or else one might feel like you love the others more!

steps.headline: Give each of them at least one toy of their own.
steps.description: The other toys they can all share.

steps.headline: Find them a bag that can hold all of their stuff.
steps.description: (ideas in tips) this can also be used as a suitcase when you go on vacation with them.

steps.headline: Make them or buy them each a tiny notebook.
steps.description: Here you can write their personal stuff like birth date, name hobbies, etc. This can also be used as a diary/journal for your teddy bear, doll, or stuffed animal.

steps.headline: Let them ALL sleep with you or give them separate beds.
steps.description: Never sleep with only one, and the others sleep alone.

steps.headline: If one gets ripped, patch or stitch it up.
steps.description: If more than one of your teddy bears, dolls, and/or stuffed animals are hurt, you can create a mini hospital for them! Put them all on beds until you can get to each of them.

steps.headline: Even teddy bears, dolls, and stuffed animals need to learn!
steps.description: Either take turns taking your teddy bear to school or make your own teddy bear/doll/stuffed animal school!

steps.headline: Make or buy them all food.
steps.description: You can use plastic food, make it out of play dough or share some of yours! If you want you can Make a teddy bear/doll/stuffed animal restaurant by Making little menus and Asking what your teddies, dolls, and/or stuffed animals want.

steps.headline: Clean them every few months, and re-stuff them every 3 years depending on how much you use them.
Give them all chores to do!
steps.description: If you use plastic plates for their food, show them how to wash it and make them help you! Give them a penny for every chore they do, and put it in their little bag. If they make a lot of money, enough for a little plastic toy or something ask is they want to spend it on that toy or save their money.

steps.headline: Love and cuddle them each everyday.
steps.description: Teddies, dolls, and stuffed animals love to be cuddled!

steps.headline: Play a board game with all of them.
steps.description: Try to play something that has lots of players so nobody feels left out!

steps.headline: Have a picnic with them all, and tell them secrets or chat about your day.

If you're going bike riding, and your pouch only has enough room for 1, depending on how many teddy bears, dolls, and/or stuffed animals you have, Take off the pouch and find a basket with only 1 handle and has enough room for all your teddy bears, dolls, and/or stuffed animals, and reattach it to your bike.
steps.description: Now you can go riding with all of them!

steps.headline: Make sure you give them all the same amount of love!
When it's time for bed wash all of their faces with a wash-cloth, tuck them in, read to them or sing to them, then say good night, and kiss them all on the forehead.

text: Choose their personality. They could all have the same personality or they could have different ones. Choose their gender too. Make or buy them all clothes, if you want. Buy them all the same amount of clothes, or else one might feel like you love the others more! Give each of them at least one toy of their own. The other toys they can all share. Find them a bag that can hold all of their stuff. (ideas in tips) this can also be used as a suitcase when you go on vacation with them. Make them or buy them each a tiny notebook. Here you can write their personal stuff like birth date, name hobbies, etc. This can also be used as a diary/journal for your teddy bear, doll, or stuffed animal. Let them ALL sleep with you or give them separate beds. Never sleep with only one, and the others sleep alone. If one gets ripped, patch or stitch it up. If more than one of your teddy bears, dolls, and/or stuffed animals are hurt, you can create a mini hospital for them! Put them all on beds until you can get to each of them. Even teddy bears, dolls, and stuffed animals need to learn! Either take turns taking your teddy bear to school or make your own teddy bear/doll/stuffed animal school! Make or buy them all food. You can use plastic food, make it out of play dough or share some of yours! If you want you can Make a teddy bear/doll/stuffed animal restaurant by Making little menus and Asking what your teddies, dolls, and/or stuffed animals want. Clean them every few months, and re-stuff them every 3 years depending on how much you use them.  Give them all chores to do! If you use plastic plates for their food, show them how to wash it and make them help you! Give them a penny for every chore they do, and put it in their little bag. If they make a lot of money, enough for a little plastic toy or something ask is they want to spend it on that toy or save their money. Love and cuddle them each everyday. Teddies, dolls, and stuffed animals love to be cuddled! Play a board game with all of them. Try to play something that has lots of players so nobody feels left out! Have a picnic with them all, and tell them secrets or chat about your day.  If you're going bike riding, and your pouch only has enough room for 1, depending on how many teddy bears, dolls, and/or stuffed animals you have, Take off the pouch and find a basket with only 1 handle and has enough room for all your teddy bears, dolls, and/or stuffed animals, and reattach it to your bike. Now you can go riding with all of them! Make sure you give them all the same amount of love!  When it's time for bed wash all of their faces with a wash-cloth, tuck them in, read to them or sing to them, then say good night, and kiss them all on the forehead.
